PUBLIC_QUOTE_REVOKED.title: Link Revoked
PUBLIC_QUOTE_REVOKED.message: Public quote link has been revoked successfully.

LOAD_FAILED.title: Load Failed
LOAD_FAILED.message: Failed to load data. Please try again.

REVOKE_FAILED.title: Revoke Failed
REVOKE_FAILED.message: Failed to revoke link. Please try again.

AI_AGENT_CONFIGURATION_RESET.title: Configuration Reset
AI_AGENT_CONFIGURATION_RESET.message: AI Agent configuration reset to default.

SMTP_NOT_CONFIGURED.title: SMTP Not Configured
SMTP_NOT_CONFIGURED.message: You need to configure your email server (SMTP) before generating public links. Configure in Settings > Communication.

PUBLIC_QUOTE_EMAIL_FAILED.title: Email Delivery Failed
PUBLIC_QUOTE_EMAIL_FAILED.message: We couldn't send the public quote email. Please check your communication settings and try again.

PUBLIC_QUOTE_CREATION_FAILED.title: Link Creation Failed
PUBLIC_QUOTE_CREATION_FAILED.message: We couldn't create the public quote link. Please try again later.

PUBLIC_QUOTE_NEW_PASSWORD_FAILED.title: Password Update Failed
PUBLIC_QUOTE_NEW_PASSWORD_FAILED.message: We couldn't generate a new password for this public quote. Please try again later.

NEW_PASSWORD_GENERATED.title: Password Updated
NEW_PASSWORD_GENERATED.message: A new password was generated and sent by email.

CUSTOM_LIMIT_BELOW_PLAN_MINIMUM.title: Invalid Limit
CUSTOM_LIMIT_BELOW_PLAN_MINIMUM.message: Custom limit cannot be below your plan's minimum limit.

TRANSCRIPTION_QUOTA_EXCEEDED.title: Quota Exceeded
TRANSCRIPTION_QUOTA_EXCEEDED.message: Monthly transcription quota exceeded. Transcription cannot be started.

TENANT_NAME_ALREADY_EXISTS.title: Duplicate Tenant Name
TENANT_NAME_ALREADY_EXISTS.message: A tenant with this name already exists. Please choose a different name.

PATIENT_HAS_SESSIONS.title: Cannot Delete Patient
PATIENT_HAS_SESSIONS.message: This patient has active sessions. Cannot delete patient with existing sessions.

SESSION_HAS_QUOTES.title: Cannot Delete Session
SESSION_HAS_QUOTES.message: This session has quotes attached. Cannot delete session with existing quotes.

SESSION_HAS_REPORTS.title: Cannot Delete Session
SESSION_HAS_REPORTS.message: This session has clinical reports attached. Cannot delete session with existing reports.

QUOTE_DELETE_NOT_ALLOWED.title: Cannot Delete Quote
QUOTE_DELETE_NOT_ALLOWED.message: Quotes cannot be deleted for data integrity reasons.

CLINICAL_REPORT_DELETE_NOT_ALLOWED.title: Cannot Delete Report
CLINICAL_REPORT_DELETE_NOT_ALLOWED.message: Clinical reports cannot be deleted for data integrity reasons.

ITEM_DELETE_NOT_ALLOWED.title: Cannot Delete Item
ITEM_DELETE_NOT_ALLOWED.message: Items cannot be deleted for data integrity reasons.

PASSWORD_CHANGED.title: Password Changed
PASSWORD_CHANGED.message: Your password has been changed successfully. Please sign in again.

INVALID_CURRENT_PASSWORD.title: Incorrect Password
INVALID_CURRENT_PASSWORD.message: The current password you entered is incorrect.

DUPLICATE_USER.title: User Already Exists
DUPLICATE_USER.message: A user with this email already exists in this tenant.

AUDIO_NOT_AVAILABLE.title: Audio Not Available
AUDIO_NOT_AVAILABLE.message: Audio file not found or has been deleted after 24 hours.

AUDIO_DELETED.title: Audio Deleted
AUDIO_DELETED.message: Audio file was deleted after 24 hours retention period.

AUDIO_DOWNLOAD_FAILED.title: Download Failed
AUDIO_DOWNLOAD_FAILED.message: Failed to download audio file. Please try again.

FILE_TOO_LARGE.title: File Too Large
FILE_TOO_LARGE.message: The file exceeds the maximum allowed size of 100MB.

FILE_TOO_LARGE_STORAGE.title: File Too Large
FILE_TOO_LARGE_STORAGE.message: The file exceeds the storage limit of 100MB.

UPLOAD_FAILED.title: Upload Failed
UPLOAD_FAILED.message: Failed to upload the file. Please try again.

BUG_REPORT_SUBMITTED.title: Bug Report Sent
BUG_REPORT_SUBMITTED.message: Your bug report has been submitted successfully. Thank you!

SESSION_INVALIDATED.title: Session Ended
SESSION_INVALIDATED.message: Your session was ended because you signed in on another device.

MARKETPLACE_TEMPLATE_IMPORTED.title: Template Imported
MARKETPLACE_TEMPLATE_IMPORTED.message: Template imported to your TQ successfully.

MARKETPLACE_LP_LIMIT_REACHED.title: Limit Reached
MARKETPLACE_LP_LIMIT_REACHED.message: You already have the maximum of 10 landing page templates. Delete one before importing another.

SMTP_TEST_FAILED.title: Connection Failed
SMTP_TEST_FAILED.message: Could not connect to SMTP server. Check your settings and try again.

support_modal.title: Support & Assistance
support_modal.description: Support included in your plan. Contact us whenever you need.
support_modal.ai_help_navigate: How to navigate and use the system
support_modal.ai_no_actions: Cannot execute actions in the system
support_modal.ai_no_data: No access to database or API - your data is protected
support_modal.ai_no_billing: Cannot handle billing or account changes
support_modal.ai_source_note: Only accesses documentation created by developers

pwa.install_description: Add to your home screen for quick access
pwa.chrome_hint: at the top, next to the URL
